text: Yeh kaafir kehte hain ke “hum hargiz is Quran ko na maanenge aur na issey pehle aayi hui kisi kitaab ko tasleem karenge”. Kaash tum dekho inka haal us waqt jab yeh zaalim apne Rubb ke huzur khaday hongey us waqt yeh ek dusre par ilzam dharenge. Jo log duniya mein daba kar rakkhe gaye thay woh baday bannay walon se kahenge ke “agar tum na hotay to hum momin hotay.”
